en.tl: Learn faster with clear paths, practice sets, and progress tracking тАФ built for students and teachers.
en.pt1: Learn STEM with interactive quizzes and fun games тАФ Physics, Chemistry, Math, and more.
en.pt2: Level up with challenges, streaks, and badges to keep motivation high.
en.pt3: Play practice battles, review hints, and track progress as skills improve.
